data.title: SOLVED: Problem with novar control board
data.meta_description: problem with novar control board went to a family dollar cause they said the alarm went off and they could smell - Honeywell CT87B ROUND HEATING&COOLING question
data.text: Went to a family dollar cause they said the alarm went off and they could smell burning...so when i went out there, the only thing i could do.. because i didnt have a tall enough ladder to get on the roof, at least not at the time...so i checked above the drop ceiling and could only get to where two piece's of flex came down through the roof along with a piece of sqaure duct going through the roof also..with a novar control board mounted to it..with i think it was 6 or 7 wires total on the board and three wires connected to the alarm.. but the fuse inside the board was NOT blown...thats the only thing i could see at the moment.. any suggestions? i thank you for your help
